scroll_drag_click: Scroll, Drag or Click to Navigate

vesslo.title: Vesslo
vesslo.description: The ultimate update manager for macOS. Unified tracking for App Store, Homebrew, and more.
vesslo.desc_short: The ultimate app management solution for Mac

keyharbor.title: KeyHarbor
keyharbor.description: Manage your software licenses with military-grade encryption and beautiful UI.

splitswipe.title: SplitSwipe
splitswipe.description: Snap, split, and manage your windows with intuitive gestures and shortcuts.

hero.title: Peace of a Perfectly Organized Mac
hero.desc:
Vesslo isn't just an update manager.
It's a premium command center completing your Mac lifestyle.

Design.title: Crystal Aurora Design
Design.subtitle: Crystal Aurora Design
Design.desc: Abandon the prejudice that utility apps must be ugly. Vesslo applies the Crystal Aurora design language, offering glowing borders, soft glassmorphism, and lively gradient animations. Just keeping it open makes your Mac more luxurious.

Unified.title: Peace of Unified Management
Unified.subtitle: Unified Management
Unified.desc: Don't open the terminal, App Store, and websites for updates. Manage updates from Homebrew, Sparkle, and App Store all in one screen.

Memory.title: Perfect Memory & Records
Memory.subtitle: Memory & Tags
Memory.desc: Even if you delete an app, your notes and tags remain. Vesslo answers 'Why did I delete this last year?'. Manage apps with your own tags like Work, Subscribed, Video Editing.

Convertible.title: Brew Convertible
Convertible.subtitle: Smart Transition
Convertible.desc: Have apps downloaded directly from the internet? Vesslo automatically detects them and converts them to Homebrew management mode with a single click. Switch to Homebrew intelligently.

Raycast.title: Raycast Extension Integration
Raycast.subtitle: Faster Workflow
Raycast.desc: Manage all app info without opening a mouse, just with a keyboard. From app search to bulk updates, experience Vesslo's powerful features inside Raycast.

cta.title: Don't Just Manage, Own It.
cta.desc:
With Vesslo, app management is no longer a chore.
Control your Mac in the most beautiful way.
